Tooltip: Performs a Log Message and ensures RE Platform Logging compliance. INTERNAL to RE Platform, this should only be utilized in a process INTENTIONALLY.

Arguments.Name: LogLevel
Arguments.Tooltip: Target level to log message at.

Arguments.Name: Env
Arguments.Tooltip: The target environment for the log message.

Arguments.Name: ActivityName
Arguments.Tooltip: The Activity Name that logged the message.

Arguments.Name: Exception
Arguments.Tooltip: The exception associated with the log

Arguments.Name: Metadata
Arguments.Tooltip: Any metadata to be logged within the message. Uses syntax to auto-inject properties of the metadata into the Message of the Log Message.

Arguments.Name: ProductKey
Arguments.Tooltip: Key of the Product Sourcing the Message

Arguments.Name: ProductName
Arguments.Tooltip: Name of the Product sourcing the message.

Arguments.Name: LogObject
Arguments.Tooltip: Whether or not the log message to console/orchestrator should include the log objects.
